Author: arabella_05
Text: yes, you can. you can do this. you have to put yourself first, not your ed. if your new job means you can't go to the gym, you have to prioritise your health and your mind and your well-being. you are a badass, and you are so young and strong and don't fucking forget it !!   try not to go too far with restriction, if you're working more hours you will need more calories to feel 'normal', and that's totally okay and rational. keep your electrolytes and hydration levels high, and most importantly take care of yourself ðŸ’•ðŸ’•
